thread.title: Attend Fall Hospitality Day at Wofford College and Stay at Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85
thread.title_full: Attend Fall Hospitality Day at Wofford College and Stay at Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Attend Fall Hospitality Day at Wofford College and Stay at Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85
text:
Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 offers convenient lodging for Fall Hospitality Day 2015 at Wofford College on October 17, 2015.
 SPARTANBURG, SC, October 06, Prospective students and their families attending Fall Hospitality Day at Wofford College will find convenient lodging at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85. The event will be held on October 17 beginning at 9am. This is an excellent opportunity for high school juniors and seniors to learn more about Wofford. The morning will include campus tours and special interest presentations, followed by lunch and the chance to attend the Wofford and Western Carolina football game at 2pm.
"We are pleased to welcome prospective students and their parents attending Fall Hospitality Day at Wofford College," explains Dawn Allison, General Manager at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85. "Our Spartanburg South Carolina hotel is convenient to the college campus and downtown Spartanburg," continues Ms. Allison.
The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 is an award winning property offering non-smoking guest rooms with microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Travelers will enjoy a comfortable night's sleep on Clean & Fresh Hampton Beds . The complimentary On the House Breakfast features healthy hot and cold items including eggs, waffles, and fresh fruit. On the Run Breakfast Bags are available on weekday mornings. Hotel amenities include a 24-hour business center, fitness room, and seasonal outdoor pool. This Hampton property received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence for outstanding service.
The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 is located at Exit 78. Nearby attractions include Chapman Cultural Center, Croft State Park, and the Premium Outlets at Gaffney. Current lodging specials at this Spartanburg SC hotel include the Weekend Getaway Package with late checkout. HHonors members can earn triple points on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday nights through December 31, 2015. AAA and military rates are available.
For information about Fall Hospitality Day at Wofford College, visit www.wofford.edu . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85, call (864) 577-9080 or visit online at www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com .
About Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85
This Spartanburg Hotel invites guests to step back in time to the colonial era or indulge in modern luxuries and recreation in Spartanburg, South Carolina. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg Hotel on North I-85 is situated to offer easy access of the Duncan business centers and is within five minutes of Wofford College. Guests can take a short drive into Greenville to see historic landmarks or enjoy world-class entertainment. This Spartanburg hotel offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.
For more information visit http://www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
Cardinal Web Solutions
